definition: the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC/Xia of the Sixteen Kingdoms (407-432)/surname Xia

sentences.english: It is the custom here to take a cold shower every evening in summer.
sentences.chinese: 在夏天每天傍晚洗冷水浴是这里的习俗。

sentences.english: This is a function declaring the hot summer has been coming.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个宣告火辣的夏天已经来临的仪式。

sentences.english: All summer, my goal HAS BEEN to catch a firefly. ---How do you translate HAS BEEN?
sentences.chinese: 整个夏天，我的目的就是捉到一只荧火虫。

sentences.english: It smells like summer is right around the corner.
sentences.chinese: 那闻起来像是夏天近在咫尺了。

sentences.english: Wild-simulated ginseng is planted in the fall.
sentences.chinese: 模拟野生养殖的高丽参在夏天种植。

sentences.english: Felton has to be looking over his shoulder after the Bobcats made a strong play for T.
sentences.chinese: 费尔顿得好好思量一下，毕竟夏天山猫向T。

sentences.english: Summer afternoons are frequently accompanied by thunderstorms.
sentences.chinese: 夏天的午后经常伴有雷暴雨。
对你们夏天的引援工作满意吗？

sentences.english: When it drizzles in summer, hiking can be pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 在夏天下毛毛雨的天气里，徒步旅行甚是惬意。

sentences.english: It assures us a promising season of summer and also the most iportant havvest season-autum.
sentences.chinese: 它承诺我们夏天和最重要的收获的季节秋天。

sentences.english: By this summer we'll have been here for five years.
sentences.chinese: 到今年夏天我们在这里就满五年了。

sentences.english: It has saved my post-shave legs from irritation and allowed me to wear shorts all summer long.
sentences.chinese: 它救了我的后刮胡子腿从刺激和允许我穿短裤夏天长。

sentences.english: In summer there were streetcars with open platforms.
sentences.chinese: 夏天，露天站台上有多辆电车。

sentences.english: It used to be called "The Land of Fire" because it is so hot in summer.
sentences.chinese: 它曾被人们称作“火洲”，因为在夏天这里十分炎热。

sentences.english: When I think of summer I think of all the bugs.
sentences.chinese: 一想到夏天，我的脑子里就想到那些虫子。

sentences.english: There is wind everyday in this summer, and there are masses of clouds floating in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 这个夏天每天都有风，并且有大片的云彩飘来飘去。

definition: early autumn/7th month of the lunar calendar
the hottest period of the year/see 三伏天[san1 fu2 tian1]
